attributes.action: Look into Sky tv to reduce their subscription costs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After years of customer’s monies in Sky’s coffers they can't even outbid a fledgling competitor leaving the customer with a reduced sports package at the same price.
So the aim of this petition is to force Sky to reduce their monthly subscription due to the fact that, in order to get the best international and domestic games, one has to subscribe to Setanta these days, adding £12.99 to the monthly TV bill. 
What a liberty it is for them to carry on taking the whole monthly sports package subscription a month when their offering is diluted, It would seem unfair that the customer is paying for a sub-standard so called 'premium' service.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
